summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5435 for the improvement of Findlay Street, from 46th Avenue South to 48th Avenue South; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 68335, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
